meanings.definition: The act of forming words with letters in the correct order.
meanings.sent1: Her spelling of the word was perfect.
meanings.sent2: I need to work on my spelling for the test.
meanings.sent3: The spelling bee was buzzing with excitement.
meanings.sent4: His spelling was like a well-orchestrated symphony of letters.
meanings.sent5: The teacher praised her spelling skills in front of the class.

meanings.definition: The way in which a word is spelled.
meanings.sent1: The correct spelling of the name is important.
meanings.sent2: I always double-check the spelling of difficult words.
meanings.sent3: His unique spelling of the word made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The spelling of success includes hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: She struggled with the spelling of 'accommodation' but eventually got it right.

meanings.definition: The ability to correctly form words with letters.
meanings.sent1: His spelling skills improved after practice.
meanings.sent2: Good spelling is essential for effective communication.
meanings.sent3: The cat's impressive spelling of 'meow' surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her spelling ability soared like a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The spelling of happiness includes spreading joy to others.
